title: The Undefeatable Dad Who Was Kicked Out of His Daughter’s Hero Party For Being Way Too Strong - Novel Updates
tags: Familial Love   Fantasy World   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Single Parent   Sword And Magic
author: 日之浦 拓
description:
As the father of a hero, Nick spent most of his days fighting demons with his daughter. Until his unnatural strength and crude personality was too much for his daughter and got him chased out of her party.

When he went running into town with nothing but the clothes he was wearing and started causing trouble, what he found there was a treasure of a time long gone, a magical relic that could speak words. They were a couple ( ? ) who acted together in their mischief, but Nick who is so far removed from having any semblance of common sense always had trouble waiting for him…

[You bastard, why don’t you ever think before act!?]
[Hahaha! I do think! But it’s just faster to start punching instead!]
This is the heartwarming tale of a meathead father who became excessively strong to protect his beloved daughter and of the mysterious magical relic that was caught up in his indecent acts and unceasing troublemaking.>
